name: Thunder
help: Deals Lightning Damage With A Potency Of 30.  Additional Effect: Lightning Damage Over Time  Potency: 40  Duration: 18s Additional Effect: 10% Chance After Each Tick That The Next Thunder, Thunder II, Or Thunder III Will Add Its Full Damage Over Time Amount To Its Initial Damage, Have No Cast Time, And Cost No MP  Duration: 12s
